meanings.definition: Lyases: enzymes that catalyze the breaking of chemical bonds in molecules
meanings.sent1: The lyases in our body help to break down food into smaller parts for digestion.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study lyases to understand how they can be used in medicine to treat diseases.
meanings.sent3: The lyases at the molecular party were the ones responsible for breaking up all the chemical bonds!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like that of lyases, breaking through any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The lyases worked tirelessly, like tiny molecular scissors, snipping away at the bonds holding the molecules together.

meanings.definition: Lyases: proteins that play a key role in various metabolic pathways
meanings.sent1: The lyases in our cells are like little workers, ensuring our metabolic pathways run smoothly.
meanings.sent2: Athletes need to have enough lyases in their bodies to efficiently convert nutrients into energy.
meanings.sent3: The lyases in the metabolic dance competition were the stars of the show, keeping everything in sync.
meanings.sent4: In the orchestra of metabolism, lyases are the conductors, guiding the flow of chemical reactions.
meanings.sent5: The lyases acted as metabolic superheroes, swooping in to save the day when energy production was low.
